isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-23 - Relocation of the Serial Number on All I-6 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Relocation of the Serial Number on All I-6 Engines

geninfo.para: The engine serial number will be relocated from a pad on the left side of the engine to a machined pad on the right side of the engine.
This will occur late in the calender year of 2002.
All new engines will have the serial number location while the old engines will still be in the same location. This will allow for a more unobstructed view

figure.caption: Figure 1. Right Side View of Engine Illustrating New Serial Number Location
